text: Assalaamo A'layke Yaa Binta Muhammadenil Mustafa
Assalaamo A'layke Yaa Binta A'liyyenil Murtaza Sayyedilawseyaae Wassiddeeqeena
Assalaamo A'layke Yaa Binta Fatematuz Zahrae Sayyedate Nesaail Aalameena
Assalaamo A'layke Yaa Ukhtal Hasane Walhusayne Sayyeday Shabaabe Ahlil Jannate Ajmae'ena
Assalaamo A'layke Ayyatohal A'alematul Ghairul Moa'llamate
Assalaamo A'layke Ayyatohal Fahimatul Ghairul Mofahhamate
Assalaamo A'layke Ayyatoha Saahebatul Mosibatil Uzmaa
